landing.noCardRequired: No credit card required. 14 days free trial.

hero.title: All your bookings in one place
hero.description: Simplify your tour agency management with our comprehensive platform. Save time, avoid mistakes, and increase your sales.

features.title: A complete solution for your agency
features.subtitle: Cloudnel.com centralizes all your operations in a single intuitive platform, freeing you to focus on what really matters: creating unforgettable experiences.

item1.title: Unified Booking Management
item1.description: Centralize all your bookings from different sources in a single intuitive calendar.

item2.title: Customer Management
item2.description: Keep detailed records of your customers and their preferences to personalize their experiences.

item3.title: Integrated Payments
item3.description: Accept online payments with multiple methods and easily manage refunds and invoices.

item4.title: Analytical Reports
item4.description: Get valuable insights about your tour performance and customer behavior.

item5.title: Mobile Access
item5.description: Manage your business from anywhere with our responsive mobile app.

item6.title: Integrations
item6.description: Connect with your favorite tools: Stripe, PayPal, Mailchimp, and more.

benefits.title: Why choose Cloudnel.com?
benefits.description: Our platform is specifically designed to solve the daily challenges of tour agencies.

item1.title: Save up to 15 hours per week
item1.description: Automate repetitive tasks and eliminate the need to manage multiple systems.

item2.title: Reduce errors by 95%
item2.description: Eliminate duplicate bookings and human errors with our automatic verification system.

item3.title: Increase your sales by up to 30%
item3.description: Improve customer experience with instant confirmations and fluid communication.

item4.title: Scalability without worries
item4.description: Grow your business without technological limitations. Our platform adapts to you.

demo.title: See Cloudnel.com in action
demo.description: See how our platform simplifies every aspect of managing your tour agency.

pricing.title: Plans tailored to your business
pricing.subtitle: We offer flexible plans that grow with you. No long contracts, no complications.

item1.name: Starter
item1.description: Perfect for small agencies that are just starting.

item2.name: Professional
item2.description: Ideal for growing agencies with multiple destinations.

item3.name: Enterprise
item3.description: For large agencies with multiple destinations and teams.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Tour agencies from around the world trust Cloudnel.com to simplify their operations.

items1.name: Carlos Ramírez
items1.quote: Since we implemented Cloudnel.com, we reduced booking errors by 98%.

items2.name: Luisa García
items2.quote: Cloudnel.com completely changed how we operate.

items3.name: John Miller
items3.quote: The only platform that truly understood our needs.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about Cloudnel.com.

item1.question: How long does implementation take?
item1.answer: Most clients are fully operational in less than a week.

item2.question: Can I integrate with my current system?
item2.answer: Yes, we offer robust APIs and pre-designed connectors.

item3.question: What support options are available?
item3.answer: All plans include email support. Higher plans include priority support.

item4.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
item4.answer: Absolutely. There are no long-term contracts. You can cancel your subscription at any time without penalties. You can always export your data if you decide to leave Cloudnel.com.

item5.question: Is Cloudnel.com safe for my data and payments?
item5.answer: Security is our priority. Cloudnel.com complies with PCI DSS standards for payment processing and GDPR for data protection. All communications are encrypted and we perform regular security audits.

cta.title: Transform your tour agency management today
cta.description: Join hundreds of tour agencies already leveraging the power of Cloudnel.com.

footer.description: The all-in-one platform for tour agencies. Simplify your business, maximize your profits.

sidebar.title: Manage all your bookings in one place

feature1.title: Centralized management
feature1.description: Manage all your bookings from a single dashboard.

feature2.title: Detailed reports
feature2.description: View your business performance with advanced analytics.

feature3.title: 24/7 support
feature3.description: Our team is always available to help you.

success.message: A recovery link has been sent to your email!

sidebar.title: Forgot your password?
sidebar.description: Don't worry, we'll help you regain access to your Cloudnel account. We just need to verify your email address.

feature1.title: Recovery email
feature1.description: You'll receive a secure link to reset your password.

feature2.title: Secure process
feature2.description: Our system ensures the security of your information.

feature3.title: Need help?
feature3.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

invalidToken.message: The password reset link is invalid or has expired
invalidToken.error: A valid token is required to reset your password

form.title: Reset Password
form.subtitle: Create a new secure password for your account

success.message: Your password has been successfully reset!

sidebar.title: You're almost done
sidebar.description: Create a secure password to keep your Cloudnel account protected and continue managing your tours efficiently.

feature1.title: Secure password
feature1.description: Use at least 8 characters, including numbers and symbols.

feature2.title: Data protection
feature2.description: Your personal and business data is protected with us.

feature3.title: Need more help?
feature3.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

list.title: Agencies List
list.description: Below is a list with general aspects of the agencies.

delete.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this agency?
delete.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The agency will be permanently deleted from the database, please verify this action before proceeding.

toggleState.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to change the state of this agency?
toggleState.activateDescription: This action will activate the agency in the database, its users will be able to use their credentials and use the platform.
toggleState.deactivateDescription: This action will deactivate the agency in the database, its users will not be able to use their credentials and use the platform.

agencyCreate.title: Create Agency
agencyCreate.description: Window to create an agency, add all the information to continue.
agencyCreate.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to create this agency?
agencyCreate.confirmDescription: Once the agency is created, you will be able to create roles to use within it.
agencyCreate.imageUploadError: There was an error uploading the image. Please try again later.

agencyEdit.title: Edit Agency
agencyEdit.description: Window to edit an agency, add all the information to continue.
agencyEdit.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to edit this agency?
agencyEdit.confirmDescription: Once the agency is updated, you will be able to create roles to use within it.
agencyEdit.imageUploadError: There was an error uploading the image. Please try again later.

agencyShow.title: Agency Information
agencyShow.description: In this window you can view all the information related to the agency.

userEdit.title: User Edition

confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to edit this user?
confirmation.description: Once edited, the user will receive a confirmation email.
